name: Zeyana Ali Muh'd
suggestion: TRAVEL AND LEARN, COOKING LESSONS IN THE VILLAGES
Source: Amandina Lihamba , Fulata L . Moyo , M.M . Mulokozi, Naomi L. Shitemi, Saida Yahya-Othman(2007). Women writing africa: the eastern region. Feminist Press at the City University of New York.

name: One Single Measure (communal)
Source: Esi Sutherland-Addy, Aminata Diaw (2005). Women writing africa: West Africa and the sahel. Feminist Press at the City University of New York.

name: Invocation at Milking (communal)

name: Nana Adwoa Anokyewaa

name: Lydia Umkasetemba

name: !Kweiten ta //ken
suggestion: WHAT THE MAIDENS DO WITH ROOI KLIP

name: Kambauruma Kazahendikey
suggestion: TWO LIONS WHO CHANGED THEMSELVES INTO PEOPLE AND MARRIED TWO HERERO GIRLS

name: Ntebogang Ratshosa

name: Di//xao =Oma
suggestion: OUR GOVERNMENT IS A GLOWING EMBER
